mapper.select: select p10_address.*,p10_assets.*,p10_assets_re.assets_re_id,p10_assets_bank_loan_re.mortgage_amount,p10_assets_bank_loan_re.mortgage_time,p10_assets_bank_loan_re.subject_id from p10_assets_re left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id=p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id=p10_assets_re.assets_id and p10_address.type=4 left join p10_assets_bank_loan_re on p10_assets_bank_loan_re.assets_id=p10_assets.assets_id where p10_assets_re.project_id=#{projectId} and p10_assets_re.status=#{status}

SELECT p10_assets.*, p10_assets_re.assets_source, json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, '$.entityZX_STZX.entityZX_STZX_CCZXCF.entityZX_STZX_CCZXCF_CCZXCF.sealUpCondition' ) AS sealUpCondition, json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail, '$.fundingZX_ZJZX.fundingZX_ZJZX_ZJZXDJ.fundingZX_ZJZX_ZJZXDJ_ZJZXDJ.whetherFirstFrozen' ) AS whetherFirstFrozen FROM p10_assets_re LEFT JOIN p10_assets ON p10_assets_re.assets_id = p10_assets.assets_id AND p10_assets.del_flag = 0 WHERE p10_assets_re.del_flag = 0 AND p10_assets_re.casee_id = #{caseeId}
select JSON_EXTRACT(assets_re_detail, #{query.key}) as jsonValue from p10_assets_re where del_flag = 0 and assets_id = #{query.assetsId} and casee_id = #{query.caseeId}
